code.originalText: ACE inhibitor or ARB + Lisinopril 10 MG Oral Tablet
Anticoagulants + Warfarin Sodium 4 MG Oral Tablet [Coumadin]
Beta Blocker Therapy + Metoprolol Tartrate 25 MG Oral Tablet
Tobacco Use Cessation Counseling + Behav chng smoking 3-10 min
Ejection Fraction + Cardiac ejection fraction, function

tr.td: 10-39 years: 55-110 mg/dL | 40-59 years: 70-150 mg/dL | >60 years: 80-150 mg/dL | Therapeutic Target: <100 mg/dL
